SEARCH
Package com.huerta.fleetmanagementsystem.model.fleet

Class Fleet

java.lang.Object
com.huerta.fleetmanagementsystem.model.fleet.Fleet
public class Fleet extends Object
Central domain model that manages a collection of vehicles and drivers.

OOP concept – Aggregation: Fleet holds lists of Vehicle and Driver objects, but neither is created by the fleet itself — they can exist independently. This is a weak "has-a" relationship (aggregation, ◇).

OOP concept – Polymorphism: calculateTotalOperatingCost() and generateFleetReports() iterate over Vehicle references; the concrete subclass method is selected at runtime via dynamic dispatch.

OOP concept – Downcasting: getVehicleSpecificDetails() uses instanceof checks followed by explicit casts to access subclass-specific getters (e.g. Truck.getPayloadCapacity()) that are not available through the Vehicle reference.

OOP concept – Upcasting: when a Car, Truck, Bus or Motorcycle is added via addVehicle(Vehicle), it is implicitly upcast to Vehicle and stored in the generic list.

OOP concept – Encapsulation: the internal lists are private final and exposed only as unmodifiable views.

    • Fleet

      public Fleet()
      Creates an empty fleet.

    • Fleet

      public Fleet(List<Vehicle> vehicles, List<Driver> drivers)
      Creates a fleet pre-loaded with the given vehicles and drivers.
      Parameters:
      vehicles - initial vehicles; null yields an empty list
      drivers - initial drivers; null yields an empty list

  • Method Details

    • getVehicles

      public List<Vehicle> getVehicles()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the vehicle list (encapsulation).
      Returns:
      read-only list of vehicles

    • getDrivers

      public List<Driver> getDrivers()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the driver list (encapsulation).
      Returns:
      read-only list of drivers

    • addVehicle

      public void addVehicle(Vehicle vehicle)
      Adds a vehicle to the fleet (upcasting — any subclass is accepted as a Vehicle reference).
      Parameters:
      vehicle - vehicle to add; ignored if null

    • removeVehicle

      public boolean removeVehicle(Vehicle vehicle)
      Removes a vehicle from the fleet.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - vehicle to remove
      Returns:
      true if the vehicle was found and removed

    • addDriver

      public void addDriver(Driver driver)
      Adds a driver to the fleet.
      Parameters:
      driver - driver to add; ignored if null

    • removeDriver

      public boolean removeDriver(Driver driver)
      Removes a driver from the fleet. If the driver is currently assigned to any vehicle, the assignment is released first.
      Parameters:
      driver - driver to remove
      Returns:
      true if the driver was found and removed

    • registerMaintenance

      public void registerMaintenance(Vehicle vehicle, MaintenanceRecord record)
      Registers a maintenance record against a vehicle.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - the target vehicle
      record - the maintenance record to register

    • calculateTotalOperatingCost

      public double calculateTotalOperatingCost()
      Sums the operating cost of every vehicle in the fleet.

      Polymorphism: v.calculateOperatingCost() is resolved at runtime to the concrete subclass implementation.

      Returns:
      total operating cost

    • generateFleetReports

      public List<String> generateFleetReports()
      Generates a report string for every vehicle (polymorphism).
      Returns:
      list of formatted report strings

    • getVehicleSpecificDetails

      public List<String> getVehicleSpecificDetails()
      Returns subclass-specific details for every vehicle.

      OOP concept – Downcasting: each Vehicle reference is tested with instanceof and explicitly cast to its concrete type (Truck, Bus, Car, Motorcycle) so that subclass-only getters can be invoked.

      Returns:
      list of detail strings (one per vehicle)

    • getVehiclesRequiringCommercialLicense

      public List<Vehicle> getVehiclesRequiringCommercialLicense()
      Filters vehicles that require a commercial driving licence.

      OOP concept – Downcasting: Vehicle references are downcast to HeavyVehicle with instanceof to call HeavyVehicle.requiresCommercialLicense().

      Returns:
      list of heavy vehicles exceeding the 3.5-ton threshold
